entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
